situation.title: Preagnancy and childbirth
situation.meta_description: Pokud se těhotná žena setká s nakaženým nebo se u ní objeví příznaky nemoci Covid-19, platí pro ni obecná pravidla.

situation.title: Weddings and partnership registrations
situation.meta_description: Weddings are allowed to happen. There can be a maximum of 10 people present, including the couple, the officiator and the registrar.

situation.title: Birthdays and anniversaries
situation.meta_description: Celebrations of birthdays or anniversaries can only be carried out among your closest family and loved ones (in particular your partner).

situation.title: Funerals
situation.meta_description: Funerals are allowed but only 10 people can be present.

situation.title: Buying real estate and moving in or out
situation.meta_description: The sale and purchase of real estate is possible in times of emergency.

situation.title: Graduation
situation.meta_description: Graduations are not taking place at the moment. Governmental and ministerial measures set out general obligations concerning restrictions on free movement and the wearing of protective equipment, but the final decision on holding or canceling graduations falls under the specific university.
